org.eclipse.nebula.jface.gridviewer

Class GridViewerRow

  • java.lang.Object
    • ViewerRow
      • org.eclipse.nebula.jface.gridviewer.GridViewerRow

  • public class GridViewerRow
extends ViewerRow
    GridViewerRow is the concrete implementation of the part that represents items in a Grid.
